# The Hearing Hare - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
The Hearing Hare is a mental health initiative website that combines music discovery with community support. Users can discuss how specific songs and lyrics help with their mental health, get personalized music recommendations based on their mood, and participate in genre-based forums.

## Key Features
- Genre-based music forums
- Mood tracking and music recommendations
- Lyric discussion threads
- Mental health advice integration
- Community-driven support system

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on accessibility and user-friendly design
- Implement responsive design for mobile compatibility
- Ensure safe and supportive community features
- Placeholder content should be clearly marked for future replacement
